Header: New Defence Attaché of Russian Federation Makes First Courtesy Call on Commander of the Army
Content: The new Defence Attaché of the Embassy of the Russian Federation, Colonel Denis I. Shkoda made his first formal visit to the Army Headquarters today (2) and  paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake. The cordial discussion that ensued focused on sound bilateral relations that prevail between both organizations and countries. Towards the end of the interaction, an exchange of mementos took place. Another Officer at the embassy was also associated with the meeting at the Army Headquarters.
